name: SkyDive Adventure by JP Zurita
description:
Aliens have taken Puca! Jump into the adventure with Juanpa Zurita to rescue her!

Juanpa can't leave Puca in the hands of the aliens, jump out of the plane in your parachute and discover new worlds full of different enemies!
Swarm in webs, crush aliens that get in your way, catch the planes that will help you go further, glide around the world, go through portals until you reach Puca and discover everything that awaits you in this new world. Only you can rescue her!

Ready for this adventure, zuricata? Will you be able to make it? Let's start!

Game features:

Play as Juanpa Zurita as you crush obstacles.
Collect in-game coins to get in-game upgrades to help you.
Discover all the aliens that can help you along the way.
Go through portals that will make you discover new places.
Make your way to Puca and face a new enemy!
Collect the different suits and parachutes in the game.
Get amazing gifts in every Zuricata you open.

Skydive Adventure is a completely free game, within the game you can make purchases with real money.

Do you have any questions? Send us an email at hello@tokyoplay.com
publishers: Vamos a Desarrollar con Tokio S.A de C.V
